name: Mnemoawari: Fire Ash, 2020
description: A 3D scan of a physical cryo-sculpture composed of ice, organic elements (ash, algae, charcoal, seeds, blooms, coral) and electronic components found in the landscapes surrounding the Bobcat Fire in Los Angeles is set aflame virtually. Mnemoawari: Fire Ash, 2020 by Eli Joteva (@joteva).
